CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Integration with macOS
CurrentVersion.description: The native integration of Universal Print with macOS will empower macOS users to print from any app, just like Windows users can today. Whether people are on Windows or macOS, they have a seamless, no learning curve print-experience. Organizations benefit from the simplicity of a single print-solution for all users.

OldVersion.title: Universal Print: Integration with macOS
OldVersion.description: The native integration of Universal Print with macOS will empower macOS users to print from any app, just like Windows users can today. Whether people are on Windows or macOS, they have a seamless, no learning curve print-experience. Organizations benefit from the simplicity of a single print-solution for all users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Set survey be closed at a specific time.
CurrentVersion.description: We are removing this Viva Glint item related to 'Self-Service' from the Microsoft 365 public roadmap. This decision is part of our efforts to streamline our product offerings and focus on key priorities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Set survey be closed at a specific time.
OldVersion.description: Allowing Glint Admins to close an active survey at a specific time instead of the default end-of-day (12:00 AM).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
OldVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts
OldVersion.description: Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -Update UI/UX admin experience
CurrentVersion.description: We are removing this Viva Glint item related to Viva Glint Admin from the Microsoft 365 public roadmap. This decision is streamline this into specific items related to Viva Glint Admin.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -Update UI/UX admin experience
OldVersion.description: Update UI/UX admin experience for advanced configuration settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
CurrentVersion.description: This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
OldVersion.description: This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
CurrentVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
OldVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
OldVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for dwell time graph in Amplify reporting
CurrentVersion.description: This release will add a dwell time graph to Amplify reporting. The dwell time graph will indicate the average time users spend reading a publication, giving important insight into the engagement of users with the Amplify campaign. This graph will be supported from SharePoint and Outlook channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for dwell time graph in Amplify reporting
OldVersion.description: This release will add a dwell time graph to Amplify reporting. The dwell time graph will indicate the average time users spend reading a publication, giving important insight into the engagement of users with the Amplify campaign. This graph will be supported from SharePoint and Outlook channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
OldVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
CurrentVersion.description: Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
OldVersion.description: Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tag Mentions filter in Activity
CurrentVersion.description: To view all your tag mentions, select the tag mentions filter in your activity feed. The ‘@Mentions’ filter allows you to catch up quickly on personal mentions, while the ‘Tag mentions’ filter helps you catch up on the Tag mentions you are part of.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tag Mentions filter in Activity
OldVersion.description: To view all your tag mentions, select the tag mentions filter in your activity feed. The ‘@Mentions’ filter allows you to catch up quickly on personal mentions, while the ‘Tag mentions’ filter helps you catch up on the Tag mentions you are part of.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Custom agent Power BI report in Viva Insights analyst workbench
CurrentVersion.description: Custom agent adoption metrics and insights report in Viva Insights analyst workbench. Scope includes custom agents created in Copilot Studio, insights are aggregated on the agent-level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Custom agent Power BI report in Viva Insights analyst workbench
OldVersion.description: Custom agent adoption metrics and insights report in Viva Insights analyst workbench. Scope includes custom agents created in Copilot Studio, insights are aggregated on the agent-level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can now reference files to help generate drafts
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a form with Copilot, users can now reference existing documents such as Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Users can also reference an existing form by pasting the form's URL into the prompt box. Additionally, Copilot can search and suggest relevant files when generating a form, so users can easily create a draft that meets their needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms has been refreshed to help users better refine and edit their forms
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Forms has been revamped to more easily help users refine and modify their forms. Users can now type prompts to Copilot to help with editing and refinement, so they can get tailored suggestions and easily get their forms ready to send.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Open previous email with Email Auto-advance
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Open previous email with Email Auto-advance
OldVersion.description: This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.
